strings:
Activity Group Group name Name/Title for activity group Home page group Home page for activity group Group button group Group button name (first one) for activity group Group Activity Activity name The name for activity Pagename The start page name for the activity Powerstatus The initional power status for the activity Definition The name of the definitition var Power On Option How to power on activity devices (serial or parallel) Pre Power On Action Action to be performed, before the devicef will be switched on Post Power On Action Action to be performed, after the device has been switched on Activities Pre Power Off Action Action to be performed, before the device will be switched off Post Power Off Action Action to be performed, after the device has been switched off Activity Group Picture Home Page Picture for the activity group
Activity Device Device Name Device name as defined in the dvar/import statement Input Action Input Action (Channel / Port) to use for this activity Init Volume Power On Volume for Device (-1 = No Change) De-Init Volume for Device Power Off Volume for Device (-1 = No Change) Pre Power On wait time Wait Time in seconds before the power on command will be send Post Power On wait time Wait Time in seconds after the power on command has been send Device Picture Picture that represents the device Device Name Button caption for the device Device Page Start Page for the device Import Navigation Bar Import the navigation bar for the device pages
Import Navigation Bar
